How to use Zero Bridge



Follow these steps to setup the navigation bridge


1. Pair the bike with your phone using the Zero Next Gen app.
2. Make sure the Zero Next Gen app is closed.
3. Install the navigation app you want to use, I recommend Kurviger app (you will need a subscription to enable navigation).
4. Start the Zero Bridge app.
5. Make sure you grant the Bluetooth permission for Zero Bridge.
6. Change setting on the main screen as needed.
7. Enable the notification use option for your app and grant the notification access permission.
8. Switch on your bike. If the status text is green everything worked.

Follow these steps to use the navigation bridge


1. Switch on your bike.
2. Make sure the Zero Next Gen app is closed. The bike should not be displaying the Bluetooth symbol.
3. Start a navigation in your navigation app.
You do not need to start the Zero Bridge app, a background service will be started and stopped on demand.

What models are compatible?


All Cypher III models (2020 and newer) with up to date firmware should be compatible. The following models are known to work:
- DSX/R (2023)
- SR/F (2023)
- SR/S (2021-2023)
- S (gen 3)

Known issues


- The bike firmware does some funky rounding sometimes on the distance to destination
- Sometimes the dash will stay on if you switch the ignition key to off and navigation instructions are displayed. Just cycle the ignition again.
- While the nav display on the bike is shown, the grip heat overlay is not shown probalby, you can still change the settings.
- Some device manufacturers have heavy battery restrictions. If the Bridge does not start automatically, apply Dont kill my app steps to the Bridge and your navigation app.

Data protection


The app does not store any data besides the selected settings. It does not make any network requests. It does not access files on your phone.
To use the notification integration the app needs access to your notifications. It only reads notifications for the enabled navigation app(s). It does not save notification data.
